bibl.title: The Production and Use of Vegetable Oils in Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Castor ("kiki, kroton"). - 3. Sesame ("sesamon"). - 4. Olive ("elaia"). - 5. Safflower ("knekos"). - Appendices. Bibliography. Indices.
bibl.seg: Sandy D. Brent, The Production and Use of Vegetable Oils in Ptolemaic Egypt. (BASP. Supplements. 6.)
Atlanta, Scholars Press, 1989, 8°, xi-136 pp., 4 pll.
1. Introduction. - 2. Castor ("kiki, kroton"). - 3. Sesame ("sesamon"). - 4. Olive ("elaia"). - 5. Safflower ("knekos"). - Appendices. Bibliography. Indices.
C.R. par Hélène Cuvigny, ChrEg 65 (1990) No. 129, pp. 178-180. - Marie-Hélène Marganne, BibO 49 (1992) coll. 131-136.
